name: VILLAGES IN JAIPUR REGION
description: This dataset provides names of villages in Jaipur Region.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: GRAM PANCHAYAT OF JAIPUR REGION
description: This dataset provides boundaries for Gram Panchayats in Jaipur Region.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: EVOLUTION OF JAIPUR URBAN EXTENT
description: This dataset provides the information The growth of Jaipur's urban area over time
reference: L&T Infra Engineering (2022) Comprehensive Traffic and Transportation Study for Jaipur Region, vol1

name: ZONES AND WARDS IN JAIPUR
description: This dataset provides boundaries for zones and wards in Jaipur (as per census 2001)
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: LIST OF EXISTING TOWNS WITH PRESENT POPULATION, FUTURE POPULATION AND THEIR CLASS BY 2025
description: List of existing town with present population, future population and their class by 2025 should be used with Map 2-45 Optimum Connectivity of future towns.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: POPULATION DENSITY MAP OF JAIPUR REGION
description: This dataset provides population density for Jaipur Region.
reference: L&T Infra Engineering (2022) Comprehensive Traffic and Transportation Study for Jaipur Region, vol1

name: POPULATION DENSITY OF JMC AND SATELLITE TOWNS
description: This dataset provides population density of JMC and Satellite Towns.
reference: L&T Infra Engineering (2022) Comprehensive Traffic and Transportation Study for Jaipur Region, vol1

name: WARD WISE POPULATION DENSITY OF JMC
description: This dataset provides wardwise population density of JMC area.
reference: L&T Infra Engineering (2022) Comprehensive Traffic and Transportation Study for Jaipur Region, vol1

name: ZONING MAP- JAIPUR DISTRICT
description: The district has been divided into 4 zones, namely, the ecosensitive zone, agriculture dominant zone, urban zone and the rural zone. The map Shows the zoning and growth nodes in the District.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: JDA ZONAL PLAN
description: Contains the zonal Plan of JDA region, Jaipur dated 2018
reference: JDA (2018) Zonal Development Plan

name: JDA BASE MAP
description: Contains the base map of JDA region, Jaipur
reference: JDA (2009) Key Maps

name: WALLED CITY JAIPUR
description: Contains the map of Wall City Jaipur
reference: JDA (1987) Key Maps

name: NAGAR NIGAM JAIPUR GREATER MAP
description: Contains the Nagar Nigam Jaipur Greater Map
reference: JDA (2011) Key Maps

name: NAGAR NIGAM JAIPUR HERITAGE MAP
description: Contains the Nagar Nigam Jaipur Heritage Map
reference: JDA (2011) Key Maps

name: ADMINISTRATIVE SETUP JAIPUR
description: contains the Name of Panchayat samiti , No. of Gram Panchayat, No. of Villages , Tehsil(s) or (No. of Villages) , and Census Towns
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: CADASTAL MAP
description: Boundary for individual plots based on ownership.
reference: Bhunaksha

name: ADMINISTRATIVE BOUNDARY DATABASE
description: contains georeferenced Administrative Boundary Database with Entire country Upto Taluk level with HQ, Entire country Upto Distt. level with HQ, State Upto Taluk level with HQ, State Upto Distt. level with HQ  Scale of 1:1M
reference: Survey of India (2024) Online Maps Portal

name: MAJOR SETTLEMENTS WITHIN THE JAIPUR REGION
description: This dataset provides satellite towns located under JDA region, their classification and population based on Census 2001.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: GROSS DENSITY WITHIN WARDS OF JAIPUR REGION- CENSUS 2001
description: This dataset provides gross density within wards of Jaipur Region for 2001.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: EXISTING GROSS DENSITY WITHIN WARDS OF JAIPUR REGION (2011*)
description: This datset provides gross density within wards of Jaipur for 2011.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: PAST TRENDS OF POPULATION IN JAIPUR REGION
description: This dataset shows the Past Trends of Population in JMC and Satellite Towns
reference: L&T Infra Engineering (2022) Comprehensive Traffic and Transportation Study for Jaipur Region, vol1

name: DECADAL GROWTH RATE IN JAIPUR REGION
description: This dataset shows the decadal population growth rate in JMC and Sattelite towns
reference: L&T Infra Engineering (2022) Comprehensive Traffic and Transportation Study for Jaipur Region, vol1

name: AGE-WISE POPULATION AND SEX DISTRIBUTION
description: contains age groups,male and female distribution
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: DECADAL SEX RATIO OF JAIPUR DISTRICT
description: contains sex ratio of Jaipur district(1961-2001)
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: REGISTERED VOTERS
description: contains jaipur city zone name, wardname, ward no., Total no. of registered voters, No. of votes polled in the last municipal election, No. of Polling Stations / booths
provider: CDO- Ajay Kumar, Jaipur Nagar Nigam
reference: Ministry of housing and urban affairs,smart city data catalogue

name: POPULATION AND HOUSEHOLDS
description: contains jaipur city zone name, wardname, ward no., Area (in sq km), Total Population (in thousands)
provider: CDO- Ajay Kumar, Jaipur Nagar Nigam
reference: Ministry of housing and urban affairs,smart city data catalogue

name: DEMOGRAPHIC AND SOCIO-ECONOMIC DISTRICT PROFILE
description: contains the summary of the census of jaipur district like Number of Villages,Number of Towns ,  Number of Households, Population , Percentage Urban Population, Decadal Population Growth 2001-2011 , Area (in sq Km.), Density of Population (Persons per sq Km.), Sex Ratio , Literates , Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes, Workers and Non-Workers, and Category of Workers (Main & Marginal),
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: SOCIO-ECONOMIC CHARACTERISTICS
description: contains the Location code number, District/ CD Block/Town, Total/Rural/Urban, Area in Square Kilometre, Number of households, Total population (including institutional and houseless population in persons,male,female), Population in the age-group 0-6, Scheduled Castes population, Scheduled Tribes population,and Literates
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: SOCIO-ECONOMIC CHARACTERISTICS- INDUSTRIAL CATEGORY OF MAIN WORKERS
description: contains the Location code number, District/ CD Block/Town, Total/Rural/Urban for Total workers (Persons, Males, Females), Main worker(Persons, Males, Females), Cultivators, Agricultural labourers, Household industry workers, Other workers
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: SOCIO-ECONOMIC CHARACTERISTICS- INDUSTRIAL CATEGORY OF MARGINAL WORKERS
description: contains the Location code number, District/ CD Block/Town, Total/Rural/Urban for Marginal workers(Persons, Males, Females), Cultivators, Agricultural labourers, Household industry workers, Other workers, and Non-workers.
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: TOTAL SC AND ST POPULATION - URBAN BLOCK WISE
description: contains the Location Code, Name of Town, Name of Ward, Boundaries of Urban Block /EB Number, Total Population, Scheduled Castes Population, Scheduled Tribes Population
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: URBAN PCA-WARD WISE DATA
description: contains the Location code number, Name of Town/ward, Area in Km,Number of households, Total population (including institutional and houseless population), Population in the age-group 0-6, Literates,SC population, ST population, literates
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: DECADAL CHANGE IN POPULATION OF TAHSILS BY RESIDENCE, 2001-2011
description: contains the Tahsil, Population (2001 and 2011), Percentage decadal variation 2001-2011,  Percentage urban population
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: SEX RATIO
description: contains the Sex ratio of towns, 2011
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: SEX RATIO OF AGES 0-6
description: contains the Sex ratio of  population in the age group 0-6 of towns, 2011
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: NUMBER AND PERCENTAGE OF SCHEDULED CASTES AND SCHEDULED TRIBES POPULATION IN SUB-DISTRICTS, 2011
description: contains the Name of Sub-District, Total/ Rural/ Urban, Total population, Total scheduled castes population, Total scheduled tribes population, Percentage of scheduled castes population to total population, Percentage of scheduled tribes population to total population
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: NUMBER AND PERCENTAGE OF SCHEDULED CASTES AND SCHEDULED TRIBES POPULATION IN TOWNS, 2011
description: contains the Name of town, Total Population, Total scheduled castes population, Total scheduled tribes population, Percentage of scheduled castes population to total population, Percentage of scheduled tribes population to total population
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: SEX RATIO AMONG SCHEDULED CASTES AND TRIBES
description: contains the Name of town, Scheduled castes sex ratio, Scheduled tribes sex ratio
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: LITERACY, TOTAL AND BY SEX OR SCHEDULED CASTE
description: contains the Name  of town, Number of literates and illiterates, Literacy rate and Gap in male-female literacy rate
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: MAIN, MARGINAL AND NON-WORKERS BY SEX
description: contains the Name of  town, Persons/ Males/ Females, Total population, Main workers, Marginal workers and Non workers (Number & Percentage)
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: ECONOMIC ACTIVITY BY SEX
description: contains the Name of town, Persons/ Males/ Females, Total population, Total workers (main + marginal workers), Category of workers: Cultivators, Agricultural labourers, Household industry workers, Other workers in Number & Percentage
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: SCHOOLS/ COLLEGES PER 10,000 POPULATION IN TOWNS, 2011
description: contains the Name of the town, Type of educational institution (Approx. numbers) of Primary, Middle, Secondary / matriculation, Senior secondary, and College
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: PROPORTION OF SLUM POPULATION IN TOWNS, 2011
description: contains the Name of the town having slum, Total population , Slum population, Percentage of slum population to total population
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: STATUS AND GROWTH HISTORY OF TOWNS IN JAIPUR
description: contains the Class, name and civic status of town, Location Code No., Name of Taluk/ Tahsil/ Police Station/Islands etc., Name of CD block, Area(sq. Km.), Number of households including houseless households (2011 Census), Scheduled Castes Population (2011 Census), Scheduled Tribes Population (2011 Census), Status and Growth History(1901-2011), Density        (2011 Census) and Sex ratio
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: OCCUPATIONAL STRUCTURE
description: contains  Derived occupational structure from Primary Census Abstract, Census of India, 2001
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: WORKERS PROFILE
description: contains Work Force Participation Rate, Jaipur District, 2001
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: MARKET ECONOMIES
description: contains Annual Income (Rs. in lacs) Main Market /Sub Market from 1999-2000 to 2006-07- Jaipur region
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: SOCIO-ECONOMIC POTENTIAL
description: A socio economic potential map has been arrived at based upon the economic and facility & service potential in the villages.

name: PROPOSED TOURISM CIRCUITS IN THE JAIPUR DISTRICT
description: This dataset contains proposed tourism circuits in Jaipur District

name: INDUSTRIAL AREAS OF RIICO IN JAIPUR REGION
description: Map indicating RIICO industrial zones in Jaipur Region.

name: TOURIST ARRIVALS

name: PHYSICAL ASPECTS AND LOCATION OF TOWNS, 2009
description: contains the Name of town, Physical aspects(Rainfall & Temperature), Name of and road distance (in kms.) from (State HQ, District HQ, Sub-Division/ Taluk/ Tahsil / Police station/ Development  Block/ Island HQ, Nearest city with population of one lakh and more, Nearest city with population of five lakh and more) Railway station and Bus route
reference: Directorate of Census Operations, Rajasthan (2014) Census of India 2011 - Rajasthan - Series 09 - Part XII B - District Census Handbook, Jaipur

name: AIR QUALITY (CPCB)
description: This dataset provides PM2.5,PM10,NO,NO2,NOx, NH3,SO2, CO, Ozone,Benzene, Toluene, Xylene, O Xylene, Eth-Benzene, MP-Xylene, AT, RH,WS,WD,RF,TOT-RF, SR,BP, VWS for 1day,8hours, 1 hour and 15min time stamps

name: NATURAL LANDSCAPE JAIPUR

name: PEAK HOUR PASSENGER COUNT DATA
description: contains location, direction, no. of alighting passengers, no. of boarding passengers and total passenger
reference: Wilbur Smith Associates(2010) Traffic and Transportation Study for Detailed Project Report for Proposed Jaipur Metro

name: AVERAGE OCCUPANCY
description: contains location, direction and average occupancy data
reference: Traffic Study by Wilbur Smith Associates-2010

name: SPEED AND DELAY
description: contains corridor name, direction(towards), distance(km), average total time(sec), average delay(sec), average journey speed(kmph), running speed(kmph) data
reference: Wilbur Smith Associates(2010) Traffic and Transportation Study for Detailed Project Report for Proposed Jaipur Metro

name: MODE DISTRIBUTION IN JAIPUR (INCLUDING WALK)
description: contains mode distribution with mode and total trips in %
reference: JMRCL(2018) Comprehensive Mobility Plan - Urban Transport Sector Assessment Report for Jaipur City

name: TOTAL MECHANIZED TRIPS BASE YEAR 2017
description: contains mode of transport, trips in lakhs and share in %
reference: JMRCL(2018) Comprehensive Mobility Plan - Urban Transport Sector Assessment Report for Jaipur City

name: AVERAGE TRIP LENGTH BY VARIOUS MODES
description: contains mode, homebased,non-home based trips, avg. trip length(km)
reference: JMRCL(2018) Comprehensive Mobility Plan - Urban Transport Sector Assessment Report for Jaipur City

name: MODAL SHARE OF TRANSPORT
description: This dataset provides the percentage of people who used different modes of transportation in 2009 and 2018.
reference: CMP ppt (n.d)

name: PUBLIC TRANSPORT MODE JAIPUR
description: This catalog contains the public mode share data
provider: CDO- Ajay Kumar, Jaipur Nagar Nigam
reference: JSCL (2019) Ministry of housing and urban affairs,smart city data catalogue

name: DMIC CORRIDOR ALONG WITH ITS INFLUENCE ZONE
description: The DMIC corridor is expected to have an influence zone of 150 Kms on either side, resulting in more than 70% of Jaipur district getting covered by the same. The map shows the DMIC corridor along with its influence zone.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: GROWTH NODES BY 2025 JAIPUR DISTRICT
description: Map projecting key growth areas in Jaipur District by 2025.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: MAP SHOWING JAIPUR REGION-2025
description: Map depicting the Jaipur Region by 2025.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1

name: SATELLITE TOWNS AND GROWTH CENTERS IN JAIPUR REGION
description:
This data shows information as per the master plan, 11 satellite towns and 4 growth centers are proposed in the Jaipur
Region
reference: L&T Infra Engineering (2022) Comprehensive Traffic and Transportation Study for Jaipur Region, vol1

name: GROWTH DIRECTION OF JAIPUR REGION
description: This dataset shows the availability of The expansion trajectory of Jaipur region

name: EXISTING DEVELOPMENT AREA BOUNDARY OF JAIPUR REGION
description: Map outlining the boundaries of existing development areas in Jaipur Region.
reference: JDA (2011) Master Development Plan 2025, vol1
